candidates.name: Jane Nees
candidates.why_elect: I am hardworking and conscientious, value honesty and integrity, and am people focused. I have a very strong management and governance background, understand local government, and I have a proven twelve year track record as a very experienced and effective Councillor. Check out my website www.janenees.co.nz to learn more.
candidates.why_stand: I've a real passion for the Bay of Plenty. I understand the challenges it faces and want to help make wise decisions for its future. I'm seeking re-election because I believe I can make a difference and want to work with our community to make "A Better Bay of Plenty."

candidates.name: Matthew Farrell
candidates.why_elect: I'm involved in the community as much as possible. I'm active here and now and for the next generation, not just this election. Vote for my common-sense, and I'll gain experience, turning my listening into doing. I will balance fair costs with prudent spending and wise project investment decisions.
candidates.why_stand: I believe elected representatives should publicise what they're doing through their time in office, and be transparent in their dealings without being invisible locally. I think a regional councillor should hear what locals want, then listen and act by advocating at regional council level, for the community.
